name: Speed Runner (noobsmakers)
description: Thanks for playing my game! In this game you are a white ball trying to get through obstacles. You will stop at nothing to get through them all. Right now there is a normal mode and a impossible mode, story mode will be added soon.  To download the game just click download then open the zip folder. Ones you do that click the icon and extract the files. After that you can click on the icon and play my game. If you want the game to be located some place else just make a shortcut by clicking the icon and select the place you want the shortcut to be. Then you can have it anywhere on your computer.  This game is only for windows, sorry for the inconvenience.
